headline.main: China Premier Pledges: 'We Will Make Our Skies Blue Again'
headline.print_headline: China Premier Pledges: 'We Will Make Our Skies Blue Again'

lead_paragraph: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang pledged Sunday to make the country's skies blue again and "work faster" to address pollution caused by coal burning.
snippet: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang pledged Sunday to make the country's skies blue again and "work faster" to address pollution caused by coal burning....
